# House (Building)
## Overview
**House**

**Create** 32 Goods, 1 Influence, 31 Labor (1,290 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Bedroom (Room)|Bedroom]], 1 [[Kitchen (Room)|Kitchen]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Sewer Access (Room)|Sewer Access]], 1 [[Sitting Room (Room)|Sitting Room]], 1 [[Storage (Room)|Storage]]

A small cottage that can house up to two adults or a new family.
